paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient A II:2 and A II:3 suffered a single type of cancer.

functional_data.summary: The variant caused transcripts that skipped exon 5 of BRCA2, resulting in an in-frame deletion.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was identified in affected individuals within the family.
variants.population_frequency: Novel variant, not reported in databases.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on functional assays and clinical correlation.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was reclassified as pathogenic based on minigene assays.
key_quotes: We observed transcripts that skipped exon 5 of BRCA2 (r.426_475del), resulting in an in-frame deletion.

functional_data.summary: No effect observed in functional assays.

variants.evidence_level: Limited evidence due to classification as VUS.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is classified as a variant of uncertain significance.
